text:
如果您未在上述截止日期内通过网络链接提交授权书，我们的快递团队将无法继续为您递送包裹。
如需任何協助，請於辦公時間內致電[redacted_number]或電郵至[redacted_email]，謝謝!
查詢包裹軌跡，請點擊[redacted_url]
感謝您對易客滿的支持!
trans:
If you do not submit the authorization form via the web link within the above deadline, our courier team will not be able to continue delivering your package.
If you need any assistance, please call [redacted_number] or email [redacted_email] during office hours. Thank you!
To track the package, please click [redacted_url]
Thank you for your support of ECMS Express!
